Hydras:

Hydras doged the beam and he transformed to his beast mode and spat 
fire with is two heads

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> Tyrael: You've fought well, Maxima, and you've gained my...
> 
> He's interrupted by the shots from Hydras.
> 
> Tyrael: It looks like we are to fight here and now, then. Do your 
> worst!
> 
> He threw a storm of light beams at his predacon counterpart.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> > Hydras:
> > 
> > Hydras signed "Wel my dear, it seems that... I have to destroy 
him 
> > PERSONALLY!!!!!"
> > 
> > Hydras flew towards Tylrael while he opened fire 25 times
> > 
> > --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> > > Flung back from the shot by Tyrael. "AAAARRRGGGHHHHHH!!!!" 
Then 
> > slid across 
> > > the ground. 
> > > 
> > > Weak now, she drew from what power she had left, Attempting to 
> get 
> > up. 
> > > 
> > > "Tyrael," sh said weakly, "You.. talk.. too... much!" she 
growled 
> > at him. 
> > > Then collapsed. Laying there. Damaged & low on power. This 
form 
> > was not as tough 
> > > as her older form. 
> > > 
> > > She still considered Tyrael more than a fool. Laying there a 
> > moment, then she 
> > > attempted to get up again. Once more, she collapsed. Again, 
she 
> > tried... & 
> > > yet again, she collapsed. She gave up for the moment, too 
tired 
> to 
> > try again.
